Summer_Event_Buff.display_help: You sneaked into the theater showing Time Gladiators or Casino Heist despite its rating. The excitement of sneaking in without getting caught has inspired you, granting you bonuses to your damage potential, resistance, defenses and accuracy.
Summer_Event_Buff.display_target_help: You sneaked into the theater showing Time Gladiators or Casino Heist despite its rating. The excitement of sneaking in without getting caught has inspired you, granting you bonuses to your damage potential, resistance, defenses and accuracy.

Power_Bolt.display_help: You launch a quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target down.
Power_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

Power_Blast.display_help: You launch a focused blast of energy at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target back.
Power_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

Energy_Torrent.display_help: You launch a cone of energy which can hit several targets. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock any affected target back.
Energy_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Burst.display_help: You launch a massive burst of energy focused on a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target back.
Power_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

Aim.display_help: You increase your damage potential and chance to hit for a few seconds.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets back.
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

Nova.display_help: You create a tremendous blast of energy around yourself, sending nearby foes flying. This blast does smashing and energy damage.

Fusion_Smash.display_help: You smash your target with your titan weapon, causing smashing and energy damage. This attack also has a chance to knock the target down.
Fusion_Smash.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG (Smashing/Lethal), Chance for Knockdown

Fusion_Crush.display_help: You crush your opponent with your titan weapon. The force of this attack staggers your opponent, temporarily reducing their attack speed.
Fusion_Crush.display_target_help: You are staggered and suffer reduced attack speed.

Fusion_Shatter.display_help: You strike your opponent with a powerful attack that breaks through even the toughest defenses. This causes both smashing and energy damage and leaves the target with reduced defenses for a short time.

Fusion_Bolt.display_help: You launch a quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of plasma at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage and lights the target on fire. It will also occasionally knock the target down.
Fusion_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Smashing/Energy), Minor DoT(Fire), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Fusion_Bolt.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Fusion_Blast.display_help: You launch a focused blast of plasma at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage and lights the target on fire. It will also occasionally knock the target back.
Fusion_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Minor DoT(Fire), Chance for Knockback(Foe)
Fusion_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Fusion_Nova.display_help: You eject a burst of plasma around yourself which explodes, sending nearby foes flying. This blast does both smashing and energy damage and sets affected targets on fire.
Fusion_Nova.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Energy), High DoT(Fire), Knockback(Foe)
Fusion_Nova.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Fusion_Torrent.display_help: You launch a cone of plasma which can hit several targets. This causes smashing and energy damage and sets targets on fire. It will also occasionally knock any affected target back.
Fusion_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Fusion_Torrent.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Earthshaker.display_help: You smash your titan weapon into the earth, channeling energy which cause a micro-fault to erupt under your target. This causes a shard of rock to thrust upward out of the ground, dealing smashing damage. The force of the eruption also hits players with shards of rock, causing bleeding, can knock flying targets out of the sky, and knockback enemies.
Earthshaker.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockdown
Earthshaker.display_target_help: You are bleeding and your ability to fly has been hampered.

Earthshaker_Finale.display_help: You smash your titan weapon into the earth, channeling energy which cause a micro-fault to erupt under your target. This causes a shard of rock to thrust upward out of the ground, dealing smashing damage. The force of the eruption also hits players with shards of rock, causing bleeding, can knock flying targets out of the sky, and knockback enemies.
Earthshaker_Finale.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockdown
Earthshaker_Finale.display_target_help: You are bleeding and your ability to fly has been hampered.

Grant_Force_Field.display_help: Your presence activates a failsafe protocol in your cyberwarrior allies. These allies are granted the ability to create personal force fields.

Armageddon.display_help: Your death causes a miniature nuclear explosion which reduces your enemies' resistance to all types of damage.

Apocalypse.display_help: Your death causes a miniature nuclear explosion which blinds enemies with a powerful flash, reducing their chance to hit.

Gotterdammerung.display_help: Your death causes an anti-matter explosion which deals significant damage to all enemies caught in the blast radius.

Deadly_Burst.display_help: You draw a bead on your target, launching a well-aimed burst of energy. The target suffers energy damage.

Force_Field.display_help: You surround your target with a force field which grants a boost to the target's defense against and resistance to all types of damage, as well as resistance to teleportation.

Earthquake_Master.display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Earthquake_Master.display_target_help: You are caught in a devastating earthquake!

Earthquake.display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake deals smashing damage and knocks down targets caught in its area. Additionally, because of debris thrown into the air, nearby flying characters can be knocked to the ground.
Earthquake.display_target_help: You have been knocked off your feet and are unable to fly.

Earthquake_Debuff.display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake leaves a cloud of dust and debris in the air. This reduces your chance to hit, slows movement and attack speeds and prevents flight.
Earthquake_Debuff.display_target_help: You have been weakened by the dust cloud remaining after the earthquake.

Hack.display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.
Hack.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that deals lethal damage and reduces a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.
Slash.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Slice.display_help: You slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. This causes lethal damage and reduces the defense of all affected targets.
Slice.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Whirling_Sword.display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense.
Whirling_Sword.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All)
Whirling_Sword.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and reduces its Defense. The target may also be knocked to the ground.
Head_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockback
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Deflection.display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast

Active_Defense.display_help: When you activate this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusion, Repel, Knockback, Hold and Defense Debuff effects for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Active_Defense.display_short_help: Auto, Self, +RES (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback, Defense Debuff)

Searing_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of energy from your eyes which sears your target. The target takes energy damage, is set on fire briefly and suffers reduced defense against all damage.
Searing_Beam.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Additionally, your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Pistols.display_help: You fire a single shot from one of your pistols, which deals lethal damage to your target. Flying targets are brought to the ground. Note that Single Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Fast

Dual_Wield.display_help: You fire a single shot from both of your pistols, which deals lethal damage to your target. Flying targets are brought to the ground. Note that Dual Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Moderate

Empty_Clips.display_help: You empty all the bullets from your pistols in a wide arc, hitting multiple targets in front of you. These targets suffer lethal damage, which lingers for a short while. Recharge: Moderate
Empty_Clips.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Bullet_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols in an acrobatic motion, catching all opponents in a targeted area in a storm of bullets. These deal lethal damage, and the targets can be hit by multiple bullets. There is a chance affected targets will also be knocked down. Note that Wrangler's Storm is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow
Bullet_Rain.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -Fly(Foe)
Bullet_Rain.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and are unable to fly.

Suppressive_Fire.display_help: You quickly fire several special rounds at your target, seeking to suppress rather than overwhelm. If the bullets find their mark, the target suffers minor lethal damage and is stunned for a short while. Note that Rapid Fire is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

Executioners_Shot.display_help: You take great care to aim at your target, hitting them squarely with a well-placed shot. The target suffers heavy lethal damage and is knocked down. Note that Dead-Eye is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

Piercing_Rounds.display_help: You fire your pistols with great precision, striking any opponents in a cone in front of you. The affected targets suffer lethal damage and reduced resistance to damage of all kinds. Note that Piercing Rounds is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

Exhausting_Shot.display_help: You fire a specialized bullet of your creation at your target, inflicting them with a poison that rapidly exhausts their body. The targets suffer no damage, but instead lose endurance and endure reduced regeneration, recovery and damage output. Note that Exhausting Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow
Exhausting_Shot.display_target_help: You are suffering from reduced regeneration, recovery and damage output. Additionally, you suffer from a brief endurance drain and are unable to fly.

Hail_of_Bullets.display_help: You fire a hail of bullets at enemies all around you, dealing lethal damage and potentially knocking affected targets down. Because of the wild nature of your fighting, you won't always hit every target every time. However, your final shots tend to strike true and will knock down affected targets. Recharge: Slow
Hail_of_Bullets.display_short_help: PBAoE, -Fly, Chance for Superior DMG(Lethal), Knockdown(Foe)

Vicious_Bite.display_help: You deliver a powerful bite to your target, crushing bone. This causes smashing damage, as well as minor lethal damage due to bleeding.
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You are bleeding, suffering lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.display_help: You lunge and sink your teeth into your target, crunching down hard. This causes smashing and lethal damage while also reducing the target's movement speed for a short time.
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: Your movement speeds and defense against all types of damage have been reduced.

Throat_Bite.display_help: You charge your foe, snapping at them in an attempt to knock them off guard. This snapping action catches bone, causing smashing and lethal damage and reduces the target's defense.
Throat_Bite.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

Growl.display_help: You snarl at nearby enemies, instilling a minor sense of fear in them. This reduces damage potential and chance to hit for a short time.
Growl.display_target_help: You are suffering reduced damage output and chance to hit.

Vicious_Bite.display_help: You deliver a powerful bite to your target, infecting the wound with saliva. This causes toxic damage, as well as minor lethal damage due to bleeding.
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You are bleeding, suffering lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.display_help: You lunge and sink your teeth into your target, infecting the wound with saliva. This causes toxic and lethal damage while also reducing the target's movement speed for a short time.
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: Your movement speeds and defense against all types of damage have been reduced.

Throat_Bite.display_help: You charge your foe, snapping at them in an attempt to knock them off guard. This snapping action infects the wound, causing toxic and lethal damage and reduces the target's defense.
Throat_Bite.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

Chilling_Howl.display_help: You unleash a narrow cone of arctic air that chills foes causing, cold damage which lingers for a short while. Additionally, the target's movement and attack speeds are reduced.
Chilling_Howl.display_target_help: You are suffering cold damage over time and reductions in both movement and attack speeds.

Freezing_Roar.display_help: You unleash a narrow cone of arctic air that chills foes causing, cold damage which lingers for a short while. Additionally, the target's movement and attack speeds are reduced.
Freezing_Roar.display_target_help: You are suffering cold damage over time and reductions in both movement and attack speeds.

Terrible_Howl.display_help: You unleash a dreadful roar which causes lingering cold damage and terrorizes your opponents. Affected targets also suffer reduced movement and attack speeds for a short time.
Terrible_Howl.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Cold), Terrorize(Foe) -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe)
Terrible_Howl.display_target_help: You are afraid and are suffering from reduced movement and attack speeds.

Will_of_the_Wild.display_help: When you are low on health, you will find inner strength. This causes you to suffer significantly less damage for a short time and recover a portion of your health.
Will_of_the_Wild.display_short_help: Self, Heal(Self), +Max HP, +Res(Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold)

Vicious_Bite.display_help: You deliver a powerful bite to your target, crushing bone. This causes smashing damage, as well as minor lethal damage due to bleeding.
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You are bleeding, suffering lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.display_help: You lunge and sink your teeth into your target, crunching down hard. This causes smashing and lethal damage while also reducing the target's movement speed for a short time.
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: Your movement speeds and defense against all types of damage have been reduced.

Throat_Bite.display_help: You charge your foe, snapping at them in an attempt to knock them off guard. This snapping action catches bone, causing smashing and lethal damage and reduces the target's defense.
Throat_Bite.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

Howl.display_help: You issue a piercing howl that inspires yourself and nearby allies to greater acts of ferocity, increasing their damage output briefly.

Vicious_Bite.display_help: You deliver a powerful bite to your target, crushing bone. This causes smashing damage, as well as minor lethal damage due to bleeding.
Vicious_Bite.display_target_help: You are bleeding, suffering lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.display_help: You lunge and sink your teeth into your target, crunching down hard. This causes smashing and lethal damage while also reducing the target's movement speed for a short time.
Maiming_Bite.display_target_help: Your movement speeds and defense against all types of damage have been reduced.

Throat_Bite.display_help: You charge your foe, snapping at them in an attempt to knock them off guard. This snapping action catches bone, causing smashing and lethal damage and reduces the target's defense.
Throat_Bite.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

Lick_Wounds.display_help: You lick your wounds, recovering some health and increasing your regeneration for a short time.

Butch.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Lee.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Petey.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Killer.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Deadly_Howl.display_help: You unleash a howl of such force and volume that it actually creates a miniature sonic boom, which travels toward your target. This causes smashing damage on contact.

Murderous_Howl.display_help: You unleash a howl of such force and volume that it actually creates a miniature sonic boom, which travels toward your target. This causes smashing damage on contact.

Super_Leap.display_help: You can jump higher due to your animal nature.

Wild_Charge.display_help: You break into a sprint that boosts damage dealt, allows you to move faster and increases resistance to slowing attacks.

Pack_Leaders_Revenge.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Pack_Leaders_Revenge_Finale.display_help: Your death enrages Frank "Hunnerd Yard" McCain, inspiring him to fight harder.

Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Aimed_Shot.display_help: You slash your foe with your claws, dealing a moderate amount of Lethal damage and reducing the target's defenses. This has a longer recharge than Swipe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Aimed_Shot.display_target_help: Your defenses have been compromised by your enemy's Slash attack.

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can immobilize most targets, though they are not prevented from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and limits movement.
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed, but are resistant to being knocked off your feet.

Shadow_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow of nether energy at your target. The target suffers smashing damage from the force of the blow and suffers negative energy damage over time, as the energy seeps into their soul. There is a chance that the target will be immobilized by this attack. There is also a chance that some of the spirit energy will splash on collision with the target, creating a pool of nether energy at the target's feet.
Shadow_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Chance for Immobilize(Foe) and Debuff(Foe)
Shadow_Arrow.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy over time. There is also a chance you are immobilized.

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn.
Blazing_Arrow.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed.
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a block of ice. Once free, your attack rate and running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Deadly_Shot.display_help: You draw a bead on your target, launching a well-aimed arrow. If this arrow hits your target, they suffer lethal damage.

Envenom.display_help: You poison your foe, reducing their resistance to and defense against all types of damage. Additionally, the target suffers from reduced effectiveness of healing and reduced regeneration.
Envenom.display_target_help: Your regeneration, resistances and defenses have been reduced, as has the effectiveness of heals.

Weaken.display_help: You poison your foe with a venom that significantly weakens their strength. The affected target's chance to hit and damage output are severely reduced. Additionally, the affected target's secondary power effects, including Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Stuns, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened.
Weaken.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and damage potential have been reduced, along with the strength of secondary power effects.

Lash.display_help: You lash out at your foe with a whip of living hellfire, dealing fire damage and causing toxic damage over time. The target also suffers reduced resistance to all forms of damage and may be knocked down.
Lash.display_short_help: Ranged (Close), High DMG(Fire), Minor DoT(Toxic), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Lash.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced and you are suffering toxic damage over time.

Crack_Whip.display_help: You crack a whip of living hellfire in a cone in front of you, dealing fire damage and causing toxic damage over time to all those caught in the arc. The targets also suffer reduced resistance to all forms of damage and may be knocked down.
Crack_Whip.display_short_help: Ranged (Close Cone), High DMG(Fire), Moderate DoT(Toxic), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Crack_Whip.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced and you are suffering toxic damage over time.

Corruption.display_help: You fire a bolt of living hellfire from a crack of your whip, corrupting your victim's living essence. The target suffers fire damage and toxic damage over time, along with a reduction in their resistance to all types of damage.
Corruption.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Minor DoT (Toxic), -RES(Foe, All)
Corruption.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced and you are suffering toxic damage over time.

Fusion_Burst.display_help: You catch your opponents in a powerful fusion burst which blinds them, reducing their chance to hit significantly.
Fusion_Burst.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Neutron_Burst.display_help: You catch your opponents in a powerful neutron burst that interferes with their resistance to all forms of damage.
Neutron_Burst.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced.

Antimatter_Burst.display_help: You catch your opponents in a burst of antimatter which annihilates some of their bodies' matter on contact.

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You take a defensive stance and strike your opponent. Successfully executing this attack will cause light smashing damage to your opponent, while giving you increased defense against their melee attacks. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing a mighty crushing blow at your opponent dealing High Smashing damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Shockwave_Strike.display_help: You swing your weapon in a wide arc and create a shockwave which travels in the direction of your target. Opponents hit by the shockwave suffer smashing damage. Targets may also be knocked back and suffer a brief reduction in their regeneration and recovery.
Shockwave_Strike.display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

Follow_Through.display_help: You Follow Through with a massive attack dealing Superior Smashing damage, knocking your opponent down and possibly stunning them. Additionally, Follow Through can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Follow Through requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Stun, Requires Momentum

Sweeping_Strike.display_help: You make a sweeping slash with your weapon, causing high damage and possibly knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Shatter_Armor.display_help: You batter your enemy with your mighty weapon dealing Extreme Smashing damage and reducing their resistance to damage as well as their defense to all types of attacks for a short time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Shatter_Armor.display_target_help: You are bruised and dazed, which reduces your damage resistance and defense.

Whirling_Slice.display_help: You perform a powerful Whirling Smash that deals Moderate Smashing damage, and can knock an opponent down. Additionally, Whirling Smash can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Whirling Smash requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Slice.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Requires Momentum

Arc_of_Destruction.display_help: You swing your weapon in a devastating Arc of Destruction that deals Superior Smashing damage and has a good chance to knock foes down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Shattering_Strike.display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Shattering_Strike.display_target_help: You are caught in a devastating earthquake!

Shattering_Strike_Finale.display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Shattering_Strike_Finale.display_target_help: You are caught in a devastating earthquake!

Quick_Strike.display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Body_Blow.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Smashing_Blow.display_help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Repulsing_Torrent.display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Focused_Burst.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focused Burst deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Fast_Healing.display_help: You regenerate health faster than the average person and are more resistant to regeneration debuffs.

Reconstruction.display_help: You concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. This healing also leaves you briefly more resistant to toxic damage.

Quick_Recovery.display_help: You recover endurance faster than the average person.

Dull_Pain.display_help: Using ancient techniques, you make yourself more resilient to pain, which takes the form of an increase in your maximum health.

Moment_of_Glory.display_help: You gain resistance to and defense against all damage types except psionic, recover endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to knocks, repels, sleeps, stuns, immobilizes, and holds.
Moment_of_Glory.display_short_help: Self,+RES(All except Psionic), +RES(Knock, Repel, Stun, Sleep, Immobilize, Hold), +DEF(All except Psionics), +Recovery

Laser_Trap.display_help: You ensnare any intruders which enter your grid.
Laser_Trap.display_target_help: You have been immobilized and cannot move.

Shadow_Patch.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets are stuck and cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
Shadow_Patch.display_target_help: Your movement speed and damage resistance have been reduced. You also find it more difficult to jump or fly away.

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You perform a strong Thunder Kick which causes smashing damage and hits so hard it might briefly stun your target.
Thunder_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Smashing), Chance for Stun(Foe)

Storm_Kick.display_help: You unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe, causing smashing damage and potentially knocking your target down.
Storm_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown

Shuriken.display_help: You through a shuriken at your target, causing lethal damage. The shuriken leaves a wound that causes additional lethal damage over time.
Shuriken.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Crane_Kick.display_help: You perform a powerful kick that causes smashing damage and has a chance to knock your target back.

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You perform a crippling kick which causes smashing damage, immobilizes the target and reduces their movement speed. If the target is flying, they are also brought to the ground.
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: You are immobilized an unable to fly. Your movement speeds have been reduced.

High_Pain_Tolerance.display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Mind_Over_Body.display_help: Your mind exerts exquisite control over your body, granting you additional resistance to smashing, lethal and psionic damage.

Fast_Healing.display_help: You regenerate health faster than the average person and are more resistant to regeneration debuffs.

Quick_Recovery.display_help: You recover endurance faster than the average person.

Heightened_Senses.display_help: You are more aware of your environment and its hazards. This increases your defense against all typed damage except psionic, improves your perception and makes you more resistant to defense debuffs.
Heightened_Senses.display_short_help: Self (Auto), +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy), +RES(-DEF), +Perception
